ygData.subject: Re: 2 EQ accounts for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: y know, I don t care if he makes a buck or two... but there are other places to post such things. I merely put a logical reason why no one should buy them. The
ygData.messageBody:
y'know, I don't care if he makes a buck or two...
but there are other places to post such things. I
merely put a logical reason why no one should buy them.
The dangers of someone not knowing how to survive in
a level 52 PvP environment is tremendous.<br>On a
side note: Why put so much time into something and
then just give it up?<br>And to anyone considering it:
for your own safety... ask for a detailed list of
every item the characters have, what factions may have
been severly hampered (i.e. did he kill a bunch of
dwarfs making Thurgadin off limits?), if you have an
account ask to inspect the individual characters. Be
thourough. Be a smart buyer (like buying accounts
qualifies...)<br>And on another side note: I am ashamed of you! Both
the buyer and the seller. Playing a paladin, knight
of honor indeed.. pfff.... <br>And if someone is
trying to tell me that it won't happen, it probably will
and I know it... but I feel that is my duty to
withhold the honor and the integrity of EQ and Norrath
itself.<br><br>Nukai Oakenwulf
